result.title: Technology database
result.description: A database of technologies compatible with the Strategic Energy Technologies Information System (SETIS) and its various tools will be created. It will include energy production, energy demand, demand side management and energy storage both in terms of electricity and heat as well as current and future technologies. The deliverable is directly linked to Task 5.1 and will be used throughout WP5. The deliverable can be considered a success if it covers the intended technologies and is compatible with SETIS.
